modName: The Dragonborns Guards- Two New Followers
summary: The Dragonborn is the hero in Skyrim, he should get some guards to protect him. This mod adds those guards.
descriptionHtml:
The Dragonborn is the hero in Skyrim, he should get some guards to protect him. This mod adds those guards.

This mods adds two new followers to Whiterun. They are located on top of the Whiterun guard barracks.

Both guards have the helmet and cuirass as any other Whiterun guard. One wears dragonbone boots and gauntlets and fights with an ebony battleaxe. The other wears dragonscale boots, gauntlets, and shield and fights with a glass sword.

Note: Both of these followers can die, but if they do it's not a big deal, the jarl will provide you with new ones.
author: chasewj1
